languages.text: "Сестра Арджента, помолимся вместе Великому по возвращении на корабль?.. Только в укромном местечке — не хочу портить свою репутацию бессовестной торговки".
"Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента, помолимся вместе Великому по возвращении на корабль?.. Только в укромном местечке — не хочу портить свою репутацию бессовестной торговки".

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女，等回到船上之后，我可以和你一起向至高无上的神皇祈祷吗？不过最好是私下里，悄悄地——我可不想在外人面前有损自己玩世不恭的奸商形象。”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女，等回到船上之后，我可以和你一起向至高无上的神皇祈祷吗？不过最好是私下里，悄悄地——我可不想在外人面前有损自己玩世不恭的奸商形象。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Sœur Argenta, ça vous dit de prier l'Exalté ensemble une fois de retour au vaisseau ? En privé, bien sûr. J'ai une réputation de marchande sans scrupule à préserver. »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: « Sœur Argenta, ça vous dit de prier l'Exalté ensemble une fois de retour au vaisseau ? En privé, bien sûr. J'ai une réputation de marchande sans scrupule à préserver. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta, wollen wir gemeinsam zum Erhabenen beten, wenn wir wieder auf dem Schiff sind? Aber irgendwo, wo uns niemand sieht. Ich will meinen Ruf als skrupellose Händlerin nicht gefährden."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta, wollen wir gemeinsam zum Erhabenen beten, wenn wir wieder auf dem Schiff sind? Aber irgendwo, wo uns niemand sieht. Ich will meinen Ruf als skrupellose Händlerin nicht gefährden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ。船に戻ったら、一緒にエグザルテッド・ワンに祈らない？でもどっか二人きりになれるとこがいいねーー不謹慎なトレーダーとしての評判を下げたくないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ。船に戻ったら、一緒にエグザルテッド・ワンに祈らない？でもどっか二人きりになれるとこがいいねーー不謹慎なトレーダーとしての評判を下げたくないんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Hermana Argenta, ¿querría rezar conmigo al Exaltado cuando volvamos a la nave? Tendría que ser en un lugar privado, no quiero echar a perder mi reputación de comerciante sin escrúpulos».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: «Hermana Argenta, ¿querría rezar conmigo al Exaltado cuando volvamos a la nave? Tendría que ser en un lugar privado, no quiero echar a perder mi reputación de comerciante sin escrúpulos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta, gemiye döndüğümüzde Görkemli'yle birlikte dua etmek ister misin? Ama müstakil bir yerde yapalım, vicdansız bir tacir olarak itibarımı yerle bir edemem."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, do you want to pray together to the Exalted One when we return to the ship? But it has to be somewhere private — I don't want to ruin my reputation as an unscrupulous trader."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta, gemiye döndüğümüzde Görkemli'yle birlikte dua etmek ister misin? Ama müstakil bir yerde yapalım, vicdansız bir tacir olarak itibarımı yerle bir edemem."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
